sentences.english: I do my e-mail on a 20-inch liquid crystal display (LCD) monitor.
sentences.chinese: 现在我在20英寸的液晶显示器上发电子邮件。

sentences.english: After spending hours working at a computer display, look at a blank piece of white paper.
sentences.chinese: 在电脑显示器前工作数小时后再看一张白纸。

sentences.english: Tabletop displays commercially available are the size of a coffee table.
sentences.chinese: 商用版的桌面显示器有一张咖啡桌那么大。

sentences.english: Hamasaki slides into them and shuffles quickly to the computer monitor.
sentences.chinese: 滨崎步套上鞋，快步走到电脑显示器前。

sentences.english: A really nice trick is to switch off your monitor when you’re typing.
sentences.chinese: 一个非常好的技巧是在打字的时候关掉显示器。

sentences.english: The systems deliver moving maps and other information via cockpit displays.
sentences.chinese: 该系统通过座舱显示器提供移动地图和其他资料。

sentences.english: How do I enumerate the display devices in a multi-monitor system?
sentences.chinese: 我如何在多显示器系统中列出各个显示设备？

sentences.english: Have multi-monitor support as well as part of the new IDE.
sentences.chinese: 具有多显示器的支持，以及新的IDE的一部分。

sentences.english: Nielsen did not provide any statistics on the reading time for the PC monitor.
sentences.chinese: 尼尔森没有提供任何关于在电脑显示器上阅读的统计。

sentences.english: They can also be custom die-cut to fit any display's surface dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 它们也可以自定义模切以适应任何显示器的表面尺寸。

sentences.english: Today's e-paper display is not yet either printed or flexible.
sentences.chinese: 今天的电子纸显示器尚未打印或灵活。

sentences.english: Check to make sure the PCs are powered OFF and the monitors are powered OFF.
sentences.chinese: 确保所有电脑主机和显示器已关闭电源。

sentences.english: The TEWS (Tactical Electronic Warfare System) is positioned in the upper right corner of the instrument panel .
sentences.chinese: 电子战术威胁显示器位于仪表板的右上方。

sentences.english: Display component selects seven-segment numerical tube LED.
sentences.chinese: 显示器件选用LED七段数码管。

sentences.english: These are the main functions of the helmet mounted display(HMD).
sentences.chinese: 这些就是头盔显示器的主要功能。
显示器无显示，电脑蓝屏。
